summary: Static analysis completed successfully. All critical checks passed. Minor discrepancy noted between appinfo.json start command and actual file structure.

syntax_analysis.description: Python source code is syntactically valid
syntax_analysis.details: No syntax errors detected in main.py (430 lines)

import_analysis.description: All required modules can be imported

build_verification.details: pyproject.toml is well-formed with valid project metadata and dependencies

startup_verification.note: DISCREPANCY: appinfo.json declares 'src/main.py' but actual file is 'main.py' at root level
startup_verification.workaround: Use 'uv run python main.py' or provided run.bat/run.sh scripts instead

findings.message: Code is well-organized with clear class hierarchy (Game, Entity, Player, Koopa, Maze)
Type hints are present for function signatures using typing module
Docstrings present for all classes and main functions

findings.resolution: Update appinfo.json or restructure project to use src/ directory

asset_verification.note: Screenshot file not verified in static analysis (requires filesystem check)

recommendations.action: Update appinfo.json how_to_start field to match actual file structure
Consider reorganizing to src/main.py structure if following a standard project template
recommendations.details: This would align with the declared appinfo.json configuration

notes: Application is fully functional. The declared start command in appinfo.json differs from actual implementation, but working alternatives exist (run.bat, run.sh, or direct python execution).
